Html:
I am thinking of forking on CodePlex or on GitHub to continue active development on this since I haven't heard anything from anyone else.

My goals are to continue maintaining as a knowledge base system for our company ( http://leaves.anant.us ) and add real time capabilities with SignalR through examples from other open source applications such as PostWorthy (ASP.net SignalR app)

If you are interested in joining, let me know. So far I've been committing to an internal mercurial repository.

Rahul.singh@anant.us

Rahul,

I am interested.

Thanks,

Peter

Hi Rahul,

I am currently working with KiGG right now at http://incentit.com and am also interested in adding SignalR support.

I very much enjoy the KiGG architecture and have found it to be very powerful, but it still needs work!

Right now I am trying to update the dataseobjects code to use the .EDMX file with the designer, but I keep getting errors saying the "UserScore" type is not found, even though I have the edmx in the correct namespace :-(

Also if you're interested, I whipped up a Thumbnail class based on CutyCapt which is a free, portable, multi-threaded .exe file that will let you do screenshot previews without any 3rd parties. It drops right into KiGG.Infrastructure.

Hi Rahul,

I'm certainly interested. This is an amazing platform and it is a shame is it dying a slow death. I have a ton of experience with the code and would be willing to lend support to increase adaption. Perhaps in addition to continued development of the code, we could pull together a community, much like Orchard CMS and DotNetNuke. Just a thought :)
  • Matt
